notes: Can we create this text by calling some EMO BON terms? "EMO BON marine plankton metagenome sample from station {obs_id; observatory}, sampled {collection_date,sampling}, size fraction {size_frac; sampling} um."

ENA_ERC000024_term: sample volume or weight for DNA extraction

check_format: can we concatenate 3 or our terms into one? ENA says it can take text and mixs says terms can be separated by ; e.g. {term};{term};{text}

ENA_ERC000024_term: amount or size of sample collected

check_format: permited values ENA: low; high. VS EMO BON values select from the list: low_tide, ebb_tide, flood_tide, high_tide
